title: Seroprevalence of Q fever (Coxiella burnetii) in sheep in the Kwahu West municipality, Eastern Region, Ghana
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Richard Kwamena Abbiw, Gloria Ivy Mensah, Delphina A.M. Adabie-Gomez, Kweku Asare-Dompreh, Stephanie Clement-Owusu, Vida Yirenkyiwaa Adjei, Shirley Victoria Simpson, Mustapha Abubakar Ahmed, Sherry A.M. Johnson
